name: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) v.9
description: For a wide Screen and the YouTube new Design: Player stay fixed at the LEFT side. - Videos related and in queue on the RIGHT side - Infos, Comment on the RIGHT side ( visible on hover their tabs) - Progress Bar is always visible So, you can watch the video AND read infos / Comments, choose next video without problem. Its Usercript version (GeasyFork): Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer)

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

additional_info: For a Wide Screen and the YouTube new Design: Player stay fixed at the LEFT side. - Title on top video - Videos related and in queue on the RIGHT side - Infos, Comment on the RIGHT side ( visible on hover their tabs) - Progress Bar is always visible So, you can watch the video AND read infos / Comments (by hovering their tabs) without problem. Userscripts support for: - Video Speed Buttons - YouTube Links - Youtube - Search While Watching Video - Youtube - dismiss sign-in - YouTube Progressbar Updater - YouTube: Age Verification Bypass (by u00F8) - Youtube Music Genius Lyrics (for YouTube Videos) - Youtube Genius Lyrics (for YouTube Musics) - Youtube UI Fix: If you need access to its settings page without login to Youtube, go here: Youtube UI Fix Options Youtube Play Next Queue: To make it working with Chrome and Tampermonkey, you need add: // @include https://www.youtube.com/* Read: PB with Chrome and Tampermonkey, which need add @include "Agent switcher": Important Note: After some problem with the use of an agent switcher, which broke this userstyle. For use with Waterfox Classic and User-Agent Switcher by Alexander Schlarb, chose as settings: - Force for the domain (the first one) - Robot: Google Bot Change in > v.9: - Support for more YouTube pages (Channels, Playlist, etc..., Youtube Music ) - Test for Embedded videos - Auto Play Button Fixed on top right column (when not in the bottom video ). - Add a "Live Chat" tab - near "Infos" and "Comments" tabs (use hover them to watch their contents) - in Video player page. - Add counter for comments really loaded (we should wait their loading before seeing the comments tab too) - Correction video player: center movie. By example for horizontal center: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_DsyLuxfu64 and vertical center: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yUif6C_uJgk - Support for no Dark mode. It's a quick support , need more fine tuning, but i use always the Dark mode... Gif Screenshot: https://i.imgur.com/OiHhCS9.gif Infos, Comments Tabs https://i.imgur.com/a3ew4WP.gif Chat tabs: https://i.imgur.com/UblxArF.gif It's Userscript version, here: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer)
